bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet!
🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.
🌸 I help flowers make seeds.

bug.question: I'm red with black spots, and considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Some people believe I bring good fortune!
🔴 I have a bright color.
🍃 I eat smaller bugs that might hurt plants.

bug.question: I build big hills and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but work with many friends.
💪 I can lift things much heavier than myself.
🍂 I live in a colony with a queen.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. I eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can be found in grassy areas.
🦵 I have strong legs to jump far.
🎶 I can make sounds by rubbing my legs together.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a chrysalis, and fly away beautiful and new. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I go through a big change in my life.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food, but I am not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is often in corners of rooms or gardens.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat insects.

bug.question: I light up the night with my bright glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 My light helps me find friends!
🌃 I am often seen on summer nights.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and like to bite people, especially when they are sleeping. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 Only the female of my kind bites!
🦟 I lay my eggs in water.
🌃 I am active at night.

bug.question: I am known for marching in long lines, and I can carry things many times my own weight. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I leave a scent trail for others to follow.
🏡 We live in colonies, sometimes underground.
🍂 We can be found in forests and even in your kitchen.

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs, and I curl up when I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to live in dark and damp places.
💯 I have many body segments.
🐛 I am not an insect but an arthropod.

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a small seed.
☀️ I like to grow in the sunshine.
💧 You might find me in a garden.

plant.question: I am red and round, and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a type of fruit that is often used as a vegetable
🍕 I'm a popular topping on pizza
🥗 People often eat me raw with lettuce.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have many branches.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall (autumn).

plant.question: I am a flower that is yellow and follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name has 'sun' in it.
☀️ I am bright yellow
🥄 My seeds can be eaten.

plant.question: I am long, green, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a long, green vegetable.
🥗 I am often eaten in salads or as a snack.
🥬 Some people pickle me.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift to show love.
🥀 Be careful of my sharp points!
💐 I come in many colors.

plant.question: I am a grain that is used to make bread and cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in fields.
🍞 Flour is made from me.
🐥 Some animals eat me in the field!

plant.question: I grow underground and have layers. You cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am a bulb.
🍔 I add flavor to many dishes
😭 I can make your eyes water.

plant.question: I am a plant that is used to make a drink. My leaves can be processed to make black, green, or white drinks. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 Hot water is poured over my leaves.
☕ I am often drunk in the morning, or in the afternoon.
🍃 I am grown on bushes.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows sweet yellow kernels that people and animals like to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 You can eat me right off the cob!
🍿 You can heat me and make a puffy snack.
🚜 I grow in long rows in a field.
